overview: Inspired by ideas from Che Gueravara and Regis Debray, a group of teenagers decided to create, in the 60s, a guerrilla group in the rural areas of Catolé do Rocha, Paraiba, Brazil. Focused on fighting local oligarchs and the military dictatorship, they ended up in jail - where they discovered a whole different form of revolution.
title: Praça de Guerra
